summary: Professional construction and interior design website for Simran Enterprises with modern design, service offerings, project gallery, and contact integration
architectural_notes: Modern, professional design with construction theme colors (teal + yellow/gold combination)
Mobile-responsive with fast loading and SEO optimization
Multi-page structure: Home, About Us, Services, Projects/Gallery, Contact Us
Footer includes contact details and GST number: 27DEQPP2708B1ZG
Backend storage system for contact form submissions using Internet Computer canister
Admin dashboard to view, filter, and manage form submissions
Email/password authentication for admin access using hardcoded credentials (admin@gmail.com / Admin@92505)
Admin dashboard includes delete functionality for contact form submissions

existing_features.title: Create a home page with hero section displaying the tagline 'Building Your Dreams with Quality & Trust', followed by an about preview section, services highlights section, why choose us section, and a prominent 'Get a Free Quote' call-to-action button

Create an About Us page displaying information about Simran Enterprises, including business details: Owner Name (Sandeep Paswan), Location (Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Nagar, Near Water Tank, Ambernath West 421502), and company values/mission

Create a Services page listing all service offerings: Residential Construction, Commercial Construction, Interior Designing, Renovation & Remodeling, and Civil Contracting, with descriptions for each service
Create a Projects/Gallery page to showcase completed construction and interior design projects with image galleries

Create a Contact page with a contact form (fields: Name, Phone, Email, Message), Google Maps integration showing the Ambernath West location, click-to-call buttons for phone numbers 9022119244 and 7754910092, and a WhatsApp contact button
Implement a sticky header navigation that remains visible during scroll, containing links to Home, About Us, Services, Projects/Gallery, and Contact Us pages

Create a footer displaying contact details (phone numbers 9022119244 and 7754910092, email simranenterprises06082013@gmail.com, address Mahatma Jyotiba Phule Nagar, Near Water Tank, Ambernath West 421502), GST Number 27DEQPP2708B1ZG, and social media icons
Implement mobile-responsive design ensuring all pages and components adapt properly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes with optimized layouts and touch-friendly interactions

Apply a cohesive visual design with teal and yellow/gold as the primary construction-themed color palette, professional typography with bold headings, clean modern layout, and consistent styling across all pages to convey trust and professionalism
Create an admin dashboard page at route '/admin' that displays all contact form submissions in a table format showing name, phone, email, message, and submission timestamp
Add a navigation link to 'Admin' in the header navigation menu that is only visible when user is authenticated via Internet Identity
Implement authentication guard on the admin page that requires Internet Identity login and displays a login prompt if user is not authenticated
Add search and filter functionality to the admin dashboard to filter contact submissions by name, email, or phone number
Add sorting functionality to the admin dashboard table to sort submissions by timestamp (newest first by default) with ability to toggle sort order
Add ability to view full message content in a modal or expanded view when clicking on a submission row in the admin dashboard

Create a new admin login page at route '/admin/login' that displays Internet Identity login interface with company branding (Simran Enterprises logo and teal color scheme) and a prominent 'Login with Internet Identity' button
Modify the existing admin dashboard route '/admin' to redirect unauthenticated users to '/admin/login' instead of showing inline login prompt
Update AdminAuthGuard component to support redirect-based authentication flow instead of displaying inline login prompt
Add 'Manage Submissions' text or description on the admin login page explaining that administrators can view and manage contact form submissions after logging in
Remove Internet Identity authentication system from the admin login flow
Create email/password login form on AdminLogin page with email and password input fields matching the uploaded screenshot design
Implement frontend authentication logic that calls backend login method with email and password, stores authentication token in session/local storage, and redirects to admin dashboard on success
Update AdminAuthGuard component to check for email/password authentication token instead of Internet Identity authentication
Remove Admin navigation link visibility condition based on Internet Identity authentication from Header component
Add logout functionality that clears authentication token and redirects to admin login page

Update the admin login page design to match the uploaded mockup (image-2.png) with feature list section displaying 'After logging in, you can:' followed by four features with teal checkmark icons: 'View all contact form submissions in real-time', 'Search and filter customer inquiries', 'Access detailed contact information and messages', and 'Manage customer relationships efficiently'

Ensure the admin login form displays the error message 'Invalid email or password' in a styled alert component with red accent color when authentication fails, matching the design shown in the uploaded mockup
Style the admin login form inputs and button to match the uploaded mockup design with clean borders, proper spacing, teal login button with shield icon, and consistent typography
Debug and fix the admin login authentication flow to ensure successful login with email admin@gmail.com and password Admin@92505
Verify that the useAuth hook login function correctly validates credentials against hardcoded admin credentials and updates authentication state
Ensure AdminAuthGuard component correctly reads authentication state from useAuth hook and allows access to /admin route when authenticated
Fix any console errors or JavaScript exceptions occurring during the login process on the AdminLogin page

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero section, about preview, services highlights, why choose us section, and CTA button
Services page listing residential construction, commercial construction, interior designing, renovation & remodeling, and civil contracting
Contact page with form (name, phone, email, message), Google Maps integration, click-to-call buttons, and WhatsApp contact button
Mobile-responsive design with construction theme colors (teal + yellow/gold), sticky header, and footer with contact details and GST number
Build backend storage system to store contact form submissions in Internet Computer canister
Create admin dashboard page to view and manage all contact form submissions
Add timestamp field to ContactEntry type in backend/main.mo to record when each contact form submission was received
Replace Internet Identity with email/password authentication for admin login using credentials admin@gmail.com / Admin@92505
Implement email/password authentication in backend with hardcoded admin credentials (email: admin@gmail.com, password: Admin@92505)
Update backend getAllContacts method to verify email/password authentication token instead of Internet Identity principal
Add delete message functionality to admin dashboard to remove contact form submissions
